Interestingly, when I add that in (cd36c63) I get tinyxml2 errors related to DART. Do you see the following:

```
Make Error at /usr/share/cmake-3.10/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:137 (message):
  Could NOT find DART (missing: utils) (Required is at least version "6.7.2")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/share/cmake-3.10/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:378 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /usr/share/dart/cmake/DARTConfig.cmake:181 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-physics1-dartsim/ignition-physics1-dartsim-config.cmake:116 (find_package)
  /usr/share/cmake-3.10/Modules/CMakeFindDependencyMacro.cmake:48 (find_package)
  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-physics1/ignition-physics1-config.cmake:204 (find_dependency)
  /home/nkoenig/local/lib/cmake/ignition-gazebo1/ignition-gazebo1-config.cmake:100 (find_package)
  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-launch0/ignition-launch0-config.cmake:99 (find_package)
  subt/subt_ign/CMakeLists.txt:33 (find_package)

```
